adHeader: **Do You Need WASH, DRY & FOLD your LAUNDRY for ONLY $10?**
adDetails: Description - The brand new start-up Laundrii now has washers in your area that are ready to do a load of YOUR laundry for ONLY $10! How it works: You sign up on our platform. Select a washer in a convenient location Drop off your laundry on their doorstep They then wash, dry and fold it for you using their own time and resources! After pick up, your money is transferred via the platform automatically. Laundrii is doing to your pile of laundry what Uber did to Taxi's and Airbnb did to hospitality... building a completely new marketplace via the sharing the economy and allowing the users to reap all the benefits. Don't miss out on this one of a kind way to get your clothes washed! Sign up at """"laundrii.com""""" today! And now for a limited time only, like us on Facebook and get a 50% OFF promocode!
